channel.title: Wow..still comfused
channel.description: wow, this is getting irritating, so, i dled the 508, and the build and the "all" commands was successful, but the client wasnt, i thought if the build and all was successful then it would work, and i edited client.java, and i set the ip to my ip adress, and i opened the source, then the 508, nothing, the 508 just says in the cmd..."Error: signlink:233 Signlink:372 Applet_Sub1: 338 client:2194 java.lang.runtime exception" please help/ this is getting frustrating :mad: :(

item.title: Wow..still comfused
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

Jpark:

well, i got “rs2” “server 508” and '508 rsps" and idk how to run the server, i know how to run the client though…which is in 508 rsps. can you tell me please?

open the server file… and click cmd and then click run

Read full topic

item.title: Wow..still comfused
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

did u run the server before the client?

item.title: Wow..still comfused
item.dc:creator: @Jpark Jpark
item.description:
@Jpark wrote:

[quote=“xstrxpurez, post:2, topic:248343”][quote author=Jpark link=topic=327383.msg2563625#msg2563625 date=1228271064]
wow, this is getting irritating, so, i dled the 508, and the build and the “all” commands was successful, but the client wasnt, i thought if the build and all was successful then it would work, and i edited client.java, and i set the ip to my ip adress, and i opened the source, then the 508, nothing, the 508 just says in the cmd…“Error: signlink:233 Signlink:372 Applet_Sub1: 338 client:2194 java.lang.runtime exception” please help/ this is getting frustrating :mad:
[/quote]
“all” means compile everything “build” means compile client… then click “run” in the server files before running your client… and if your gonna log on to ur own server make the ip on the client that ur using either 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0, or “localhost”[/quote]
i changed it to 127.0.0.1 and the same error happened. :s

Read full topic

item.title: Wow..still comfused
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

Jpark:

wow, this is getting irritating, so, i dled the 508, and the build and the “all” commands was successful, but the client wasnt, i thought if the build and all was successful then it would work, and i edited client.java, and i set the ip to my ip adress, and i opened the source, then the 508, nothing, the 508 just says in the cmd…“Error: signlink:233 Signlink:372 Applet_Sub1: 338 client:2194 java.lang.runtime exception” please help/ this is getting frustrating :mad:

“all” means compile everything “build” means compile client… then click “run” in the server files before running your client… and if your gonna log on to ur own server make the ip on the client that ur using either 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0, or “localhost”

Read full topic
